welcome_message_body: Welcome to Birkenhead, a charming town known for its stunning waterfront views and rich maritime history. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all the city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Capitol
restaurants.description: Capitol is a chinese restaurant located in Birkenhead.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is dedicated to handling charter flights for holiday destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights at Manchester Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Primarily used for domestic and European flights at Manchester Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a mix of international and domestic flights.
